website_summaries.verdict: A good choice when fast firing power is preferred over long range.
pros: Offers rapid pump action in an easy-to-use model that can be fired with one hand
Falls on the middle of the price spectrum
cons: Though it offers rapid fire, the downside is the need for frequent reloads – holds just 6 darts at one time

customer_reviews.title: Not practical, but VERY fun
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a giant Strongarm without a drop-out mechanism and a pump grip to prime. I got it for relatively cheap, and while this blaster is not practical, being huge for only 6 shots, its given me only quality performance and an amazing feel. I feel awesome priming and firing it, making it worth it for me. If this is too expensive for you, get a Strongarm, but if you want the fun, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for younger Nerfers
customer_reviews.text: I settled on this for my 5 year old since the pump has a shorter throw and relatively light cocking action based on YouTube videos I watched. And while both did prove to be true, there is still a slightly heavier final "click" that takes at little technique for him to overcome. He's used to wrestling with larger Nerf guns but I've generally found the rear T-bar style (for example, Nerf Dual-Strike) to be better for kids with shorter arms or less brute strength.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS ONE TOUGH, RAPID FIRE FUN TOY
customer_reviews.text: Great Nerf product. This one is still working perfectly after a full month in the hands of my six year old grandson. Solidly built and very tough. There are others that are less and even more expensive that have very poor customer ratings.
customer_reviews.author: George E Zorgo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Blaster! One of my Favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This blaster is one of my favorites. It's not the most accurate blaster, but it does fine. You'll never notice the difference with Elite darts. It tends to shoot a little off center due to the cylinder rotation, but it's consistent. I am able to consistently hit targets with waffle head darts or x-shot darts. It's reliable. Doesn't jam or malfunction. Easy to pump and scavenge darts/load while running around. That's why I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Huzbum

customer_reviews.title: because he's a super cool kid) and I'm thrilled with this product
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a Nerf gun for Christmas (and a My Little Pony for Mommy, because he's a super cool kid) and I'm thrilled with this product. The price was right and he LOVES it. Since "Santa" didn't show up at our house this year it's good that I could make this awesome present happen. My only issue is that the darts fall out if you carry it pointing down sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: LizLiz

customer_reviews.title: Non-functional out of box, replacements non-functional also. Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Order 2 for Christmas for the kids. One didn't work out of the box, other started failing soon after. I immediately replaced the one that failed out of the box, and got an totally non functional nerf gun. One of the nerf guns came with odd colored nerf darts as if it had been repackaged. I have since sent all of them back. I will try a different model maybe but will not buy of the doomlands series.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't overly impressed with this one anyways, but I had to return mine because the cylinder wouldn't rotate about a third of the time after firing. The gun looks nice but that's about the only compliment I can give it. The function wasn't anything to be impressed with and it's too big for a six shooter. Nerf has come out with too many turds lately.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Roehl

customer_reviews.title: The best nerf revolver out there
customer_reviews.text: The best nerf revolver. Pump action makes slam fire far more accurate. It feels good to hold. You can see the internals, and it loads nicely. Also it looks great. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Gavin M

customer_reviews.title: Great! Son Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My son saved up his allowance to buy this gun. He loves it. Shoots well and far. Can hurt if shot too close to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Small

customer_reviews.title: My nephew LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun to use. The black tips are soft put it does have some power when the gun shoots...does sting a little! Dont aim for the face.
customer_reviews.author: Jose' A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, just wish there was a place to store more darts or an amo pouch included
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Zienkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Booyah!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest looking and most fun to use Nerf guns there are. It shoots at approximately the same speed as other Nerf guns.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi Guy

customer_reviews.title: Large guns
customer_reviews.text: These are really large! They are hard for my songs to hold and load.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: fun big blaster
customer_reviews.text: this is my preferred blaster when me and my kids are having a nerf battle around the house works just like it should

customer_reviews.title: This is possibly the best nerf gun out on the market right now
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the best nerf gun out on the market right now. Pump action really makes this thing stand out. Very slick design.

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew and it broke after three uses and he loved it.

customer_reviews.title: The gun broke 3 days after i got it, ...
customer_reviews.text: The gun broke 3 days after i got it, for no reason. The reloading mechanism simply stopped working. Amazon sent me another one though,

customer_reviews.title: PACTS A PUNCH!

customer_reviews.title: Fun style, Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Fun style, Kids love it. But its not very well built compared to older nerf guns. Perhaps this is the new normal.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but probably one of the worst guns Nerf ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but probably one of the worst guns Nerf has ever made. Jams and does not shoot that far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't give my nephew this as a Christmas gift, because I wanted to keep it for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, was surprisingly easy to break the pump though
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was surprisingly easy to break the pump though. Just use it like a responsible human and don't try to action-pump it in the middle of a heated nerf battle.

customer_reviews.title: This was my 4 year olds Favorite Christmas gift

customer_reviews.text: This was for grandpa but the grandsons love it so grandpa does not get to shoot it much. If kids use be sure they know not to shoot at anything breakable. Powerful speed.

customer_reviews.title: Jams too much - Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Jams too often to be worth it. Pretty accurate when working right. the other doomland revolvers do better, this one falls really short.
customer_reviews.author: Al C.

customer_reviews.title: Neat Nerf Gun
customer_reviews.text: Fun nerf gun. Can see the inside mechanisms working. Shoots pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bielicke

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Stupid blaster. Amazon stopped printing my negative comments and I'm surprised they keep asking my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this nerf gun. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mehri

customer_reviews.title: bought 3 as gifts for 10 year olds. at ...
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 as gifts for 10 year olds. at the end of the nerf war all 3 were still armed with this gun. impressed considering all 3 of them have guns twice the cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a classic design. Plan to modify and detail so it will be even more cool.

customer_reviews.text: I received the gun without bump handle on it as shown on the picture, looks it's missed.

customer_reviews.title: Burns out quick.
customer_reviews.text: After a day or 2 of use, it seems to become less effective unlike some of the other nerf guns I've used.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This gun is amazing and huge in person my son loves it bought it for Christmas he's 4

customer_reviews.text: This arrived fast, was entertaining for my nephew. however, one dart kept getting stuck in the loader.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: not the best quality. The bullets get stuck within before shooting out. its difficult to untangle them and even when you do it, the bullets too damaged to use again

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and does not jam. Kids love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoots great!! Rotating barrel is awesome and will be admired by anyone watching!!

customer_reviews.title: disapointing
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Satisfying pump action. Physically large. Half the range of cheaper nerf, and a 12 inch grouping at 4 yards. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this for not just our young kids but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this for not just our young kids but the adults had fun. The only​ reason I gave a 4 we bought 2 and one broke!
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Baker-Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Fun gun
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to use, and hassle free packaging is the best part of the whole deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great. my son have two machine guns
customer_reviews.text: Great. my son have two machine guns. I have this only. I didnt step back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the gun. He likes the functions that it offers him during his nerf battles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jams Repeatedly - Buy Another Model
customer_reviews.text: We bought several Nerf guns this Christmas for our boys. You can (almost) never go wrong with giving Nerf guns to boys as a gift - but this one just didn't work great at all. It has a tendency to jam & bullets get stuck in the chamber which have to be removed repeatedly by mom. We ended up with a very disappointed little boy and a bunch of broken bullets. And, No this wasn't operator error - We own many Nerf products & this one just didn't work smoothly. Here's another one we bought & it worked much better:
customer_reviews.author: A Little Insanity

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fire and load
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 9 year old son wanted. Easy to fire and load. Now if I could only get him to stop shooting me while I make dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: It got jammed, but we fixed it. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Looks neat, firing power is about average. Sneaking ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks neat, firing power is about average. Sneaking suspicion that the fanciful design is slightly detrimental to performance, but in an indoor nerf war environment with little kids, it's not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like nerf guns!? But be warned!.... these things are very powerful! Close range would do serious damage to eyes or other body parts! I'm not an over protective mom and I let my kids be kids but after our first Family Christmas Nerf Gun War I've had to set some rules with these things! 1. No shooting in the house. 2. No close range shooting. 3. No pointing at someone face. 4. Eye protection!!
customer_reviews.author: vfw1982

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day. Not sure what failed, ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day. Not sure what failed, but it will not fire. Also unwieldy. I thought the pump-action would be easier for my 5-year-old to cock, but it wasn't and he had a hard time holding it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Works Great. Slam Fire is always nice and the build is large enough for adults and also not too large for smaller children
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Fam

customer_reviews.title: fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: NOT very accurate...lagging on the impact. fun to play with though
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE RESZLER

customer_reviews.title: Good flight and a great look for a nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: Good flight and a great look for a nerf gun. My only problem is the combination of pump action and rotating barrel means it is easy to jam up with improper timing. I wanted something akin to a large pistol but this is more like a sawed-off style of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Bought it as a gift for my nephew's 7th birthday and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SiaLaterBye

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but does not have the range and accuracy of some cheaper models
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Kottka Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Jammed 1st day...unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Gun didn't survive the first Nerf Battle with my sons. Started out as a great addition but after about 40 darts, the pump locked up. I couldn't get the slide to cycle properly without forcing it and it never returned to full functionality. I returned the toy the next day... When it was working it was a great little shotgun. Sad it jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Opened it this morning played with my son and the thing already broke, complete garbage and a disappointment considering it was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: DarthxRuby

product_meta.title: Nerf Vagabond Doomlands Toy Blaster with Rotating 6-Dart Barrel & 6 Official Elite Doomlands Darts for Kids, Teens, & Adults
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Frustration-Free Packaging

 In a post-apocalyptic future, the Earth is left a barren, lawless wasteland. Out of the ashes, a lone hero emerges to bring justice to a doomed land. Welcome to the world of Doomlands! Fire 6 darts in a row with pump-action blasting from the Nerf Doomlands Vagabond blaster! Imagine yourself as a lone hero battling the lawless criminals who roam a rough-and-tumble world. Be ready for action with the Vagabond Nerf blaster that has a rotating 6-dart barrel, to pump out 6 shots and send the bad guys running. It comes with 6 Official Nerf Doomlands Elite darts that are designed for distance, tested and approved for performance and quality, and constructed of foam with flexible, hollow tips. Look through the clear area on this Doomlands Nerf blaster to see the internal firing mechanism move when you fire. Gear up for Nerf battles and games with the Vagabond blaster that’s powered by hand -- no batteries required. Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: FIRES 6 DARTS IN A ROW: Shoot 6 darts in a row from the revolving, 6-dart barrel on this Nerf Doomlands Vagabond blaster as you imagine yourself to be a lone hero in a post-apocalpytic world
PUMP-ACTON BLASTING: Pump the handle and pull the trigger to blast the bad guys with darts from this Doomlands Nerf toy blaster that’s powered by you -- no batteries required
INCLUDES 6 NERF DARTS: Includes 6 Official Nerf Doomlands Elite darts that are tested and approved for performance and quality and constructed of foam with flexible, hollow tips
SEE INSIDE THE BLASTER: Look through the clear area on this Doomlands Nerf blaster to see the internal firing mechanism and watch it in action when you fire the blaster

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
